passive.name: Visioscape
passive.description:
Increases the wearer's Max HP by {{1, percent}}% and Energy Regeneration Rate by {{4, percent}}%. When the wearer's HP is reduced, all allies' DMG dealt increases by {{2, percent(fixed: 1)}}%, lasting for {{5}} turn(s).
At the start of every wave, restores HP to all allies by an amount equal to {{3, percent}}% of their respective lost HP.
